languages.text: "Возможно из-за постоянной близости мучительной смерти в огне у меня подавлен... как там его? Инстинкт самосохранения. Или я просто наслаждаюсь каждой минутой, когда можно дышать дымом лхо, а не гарью. Покорнейше прошу прощения за свои манеры, Лорд-капитан". {n}Энрих продолжает улыбаться без капли смущения.{/n}

"Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Возможно из-за постоянной близости мучительной смерти в огне у меня подавлен... как там его? Инстинкт самосохранения. Или я просто наслаждаюсь каждой минутой, когда можно дышать дымом лхо, а не гарью. Покорнейше прошу прощения за свои манеры, Лорд-капитан". {n}Энрих продолжает улыбаться без капли смущения.{/n}

languages.text: « Peut-être que quand on risque tous les jours de mourir dans d'atroces souffrances, consumé par les flammes, on a tendance à développer un... comment on appelle ça, déjà ? Ah oui. Un instinct de conservation. Ou peut-être que je me contente de savourer chaque seconde où je peux inhaler de la fumée de lho plutôt que des cendres. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, si mes manières vous déplaisent, je vous présente mes plus plates excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Einrich ne se départit pas de son sourire et ne montre pas non plus la moindre trace de gêne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Peut-être que quand on risque tous les jours de mourir dans d'atroces souffrances, consumé par les flammes, on a tendance à développer un... comment on appelle ça, déjà ? Ah oui. Un instinct de conservation. Ou peut-être que je me contente de savourer chaque seconde où je peux inhaler de la fumée de lho plutôt que des cendres. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, si mes manières vous déplaisent, je vous présente mes plus plates excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Einrich ne se départit pas de son sourire et ne montre pas non plus la moindre trace de gêne.{/n}

languages.text: «Tal vez sea porque vivo bajo la amenaza constante de una muerte agónica entre las llamas, pero mi instinto de... supervivencia, supongo, está reprimido. O eso o disfruto de cada minuto en el que puedo respirar humo de lho en lugar de ceniza. Me disculpo humildemente por mis modales, Lord Capitán». {n}Einrich sigue sonriendo sin la más mínima vergüenza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez sea porque vivo bajo la amenaza constante de una muerte agónica entre las llamas, pero mi instinto de... supervivencia, supongo, está reprimido. O eso o disfruto de cada minuto en el que puedo respirar humo de lho en lugar de ceniza. Me disculpo humildemente por mis modales, Lord Capitán». {n}Einrich sigue sonriendo sin la más mínima vergüenza.{/n}

languages.text: “可能是因为我时时刻刻都可能在火海里惨死吧，我身上的，呃，那个词是怎么说的来着？……对，自我保护的本能，我这个本能已经被抑制住了。也可能是因为我难得不用呼吸煤渣，想好好享受一下麻烟的味道吧。我为我的失礼向您道歉，舰长大人。”{n}艾因里奇继续微笑着，没有一丝局促不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “可能是因为我时时刻刻都可能在火海里惨死吧，我身上的，呃，那个词是怎么说的来着？……对，自我保护的本能，我这个本能已经被抑制住了。也可能是因为我难得不用呼吸煤渣，想好好享受一下麻烟的味道吧。我为我的失礼向您道歉，舰长大人。”{n}艾因里奇继续微笑着，没有一丝局促不安。{/n}

languages.text: 「もしかして、私は火による死を常に恐れているからかもしれない。私は…えっと、何て言うんだっけ？『自衛本能』を身に着けたんです。あるいは、燃えかすの代わりにルホを吸えるのが嬉しいだけかもしれない。この失礼をお詫びいたします、ロード・キャプテン」{n} アインリッヒは照れくさそうに微笑み続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もしかして、私は火による死を常に恐れているからかもしれない。私は…えっと、何て言うんだっけ？『自衛本能』を身に着けたんです。あるいは、燃えかすの代わりにアイホを吸えるのが嬉しいだけかもしれない。この失礼をお詫びいたします、ロード・キャプテン」{n} アインリッヒは照れくさそうに微笑み続ける。{/n}

languages.text: "Nun, ich lebe mit der ständigen Gefahr eines qualvollen Todes im Feuer, vielleicht habe ich daher einen unterdrückten, äh, wie heißt das? Selbsterhaltungsinstinkt. Oder vielleicht genieße ich einfach jede Minute, in der ich Lho-Rauch einatmen darf statt Asche. Ich bitte höflichst um Entschuldigung für meine Manieren, Lord Captain"{n}, fährt Einrich ohne einen Funken Scham fort.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}

Ich bitte höflichst um Entschuldigung für meine Manieren, Lord Captain"{n}, fährt Einrich ohne einen Funken Scham fort.{/n}

languages.text: "Belki de sürekli olarak yangında acı içinde ölme tehlikesi altında yaşadığım için fazla... Şey, nasıl denir? Kendini koruma içgüdüsüne sahip değilimdir. Belki de kül yerine liho dumanı soluyabildiğim her an için sevinç duyuyorumdur. Davranış şeklim için özürlerimi sunuyorum Lord Kaptan." {n}Einrich, herhangi bir utanç emaresi göstermeden gülümsemeye devam ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps because I live under the constant threat of an agonising death by fire, I have a repressed, uh, what's the word? Self-preservation instinct. Or maybe I just relish every minute I get to breathe lho smoke instead of cinders. I humbly apologise for my manners, Lord Captain." {n}Einrich continues to smile without a shred of embarrassment.{/n}
